data.text:
Anthony Coulls’ Post

Curator, Author, Presenter, Trustee and Volunteer, passionate about industry, engineering and transport.

4mo Edited

Michael Portillo filmed at the National Railway Museum last year and my interview about the 125 is now out with Great British Railway Journeys series 15 going live on Monday 1st April. Looks good on first viewing, though I am somewhat overshadowed by Mr P's wardrobe!
